title: Saridhana Saridhana Lyrics Amara Kaaviyam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Saridhana Saridhana
Singer(s): Yazin Nizar, Thomson Andrews
Movie:Â Amara Kaaviyam
Music: M Ghibran

Idhan Munne Siruvan Naane
Inimaele Ilaignyan Naane
Irandirkum Naduvil Nee
Saridhaana?

Idhan Munne Snehithi Nee
Inimaele Kaadhali Nee
Irandirkum Naduvil Naan
Saridhaana?

Saridhaana Muraidhaana
Ithu Naana Naana Naana?
Viduvena Ezhuvena
Ini Naanaum Naanum Naana? (2)

Yaavum Pudhidhaai Theriyum Vayadhu
Yaavum Azhagaai Vizhyil Vizhyil Thrigiradhey
Netru En Kaadhile Ketta Paadale
Vearena Maariye Ketpadho Saridhaana?

Saridhaana Muraidhaana
Ithu Naana Naana Naana?
Viduvena Ezhuvena
Ini Naanaum Naanum Naana? (2)

Nenjam thadumarum Paruvam Ithuvo
Pengal Paarthaal
Lesa Idhayam Ganakiradho.
Thozhanin Kaadhali Thozhiya Thangaya
Rendume Illaiya Kelviye Saridhaana?

Azhagana Kirukkal Naan
Mudivilla Theruvum Naan
Kulir Kaattrin Kurumbum Naan
Inimaele..
